body_html: From what I'm reading, the solution would have been the abovementioned hiptensorflow, where HIP is a tool to convert code from CUDA (nvidia specific) to ROCm (AMD specific). Sadly it looks like that repo has been pulled from github, all links (even from current Google searches) give 404. Would be great to hear an official update on the status.

body: From what I'm reading, the solution would have been the abovementioned hiptensorflow, where HIP is a tool to convert code from CUDA (nvidia specific) to ROCm (AMD specific). Sadly it looks like that repo has been pulled from github, all links (even from current Google searches) give 404. Would be great to hear an official update on the status.
